resetPassword_confirmPasswordMismatchMes: Confirm Password and New Password are not same
resetPassword_newPasswordSameAsCurrentMe: New password cannot be the same as the current password
resetPassword_helperText: Please enter your current password followed by a new password that meets our security requirements.
resetPassword_newPasswordDigitMessage: Your password must include at least one digit (0-9)
resetPassword_newPasswordSymbolMessage: Your password must include at least one special character (e.g., @, #, $, %, &)
resetPassword_newPasswordMinLengthMessag: Your password must be at least 8 characters long
resetPassword_errorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
